short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that uniquely sorts your browser tabs based on title or URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that uniquely sorts your browser tabs based on title or URL.
It also offers the ability to prioritize sorting by specific strings, keeping your important tabs at your fingertips.
